message: Leslie is much loved, but doesn't want a back rub

What can I say about Best Choice Care? Let me count the ways 1, 2, 3, ... The name says it all; they realy are the best and the service is outstanding, so there really is no choice, if you want the best. Let me re-emphasise: What can I say about Best Choice Care?
